name: Daily Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
The new Jigsaw Puzzle game from the makers of hit app, Daily Jigsaw Puzzle!
The super hit game Daily Jigsaw Puzzle is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
Free updates with new Jigsaw Every Day!!!
-------------------------------------------
● Free updates with new Jigsaw Every Day!!! - each one is unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!
● TASTY GRAPHICS that will leave you hungry for more
● EASY AND FUN to play, but a challenge to fully master
● LEADER BOARDS for you and your friends
● TOP-NOTCH performance! Animated Jigsaw, effects!
● FREE updates with new jigsaw, boosts, and more!
--------------------------------------------
Please note: Your device must have an active internet connection to download additional levels.

Please note: Daily Jigsaw Puzzle is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money.

Last, but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Daily Jigsaw Puzzle!
